name: uyCoding
description:
uyCoding is an agile consulting and engineering firm specialized on the construction of scalable software experiences for organizations of diverse context and scale. We can handle anything.
Using a set of well ­defined and mature practices, we enable both medium and enterprise-level clients to execute their vision of building solutions that empower the growth of their businesses.
 
Based in Punta del Este, Uruguay, we are in a very friendly timezone to work with the US and Europe.
One of the main factors for our success is our ability to constantly collaborate with our clients teams seamlessly through the use of tools like Jira, Skype and Slack. We feel that communication is key, hence we keep a close and personal relationship with our customers during the whole project lifecycle
